title: Zoroastrianism
description: Zoroastrianism is one of the world's oldest religions. Dating back to 600 B.C.E, this religion was founded by an Iranian prophet named Zarathushtra.

title: Jesus Was Born
description: Jesus was born around 6-4 B.C.E in Bethlehem.

title: Crucifixion of Jesus
description: Portrayed as a sacrifice, Jesus was cruicifed in Judea by the Romans.

title: Christianity
description: After the death of Christianity was founded by a group of Jewish people after Jesus was resurrected.

title: The Religion of Islam
description: Founded in 620 A.C, Islam is the second most popular world religion.
